---
category: news
title: "HCA, others use Franklin startup’s AI for cancer care"
excerpt: "A Franklin tech startup in the health care sector is marketing a novel platform to streamline cancer diagnostics in real time. The new platform — a product from local firm, Azra Al — is the company’s software utilizing artificial intelligence to consolidate and take over the manual and repetitive processes whereby positive cancer diagnoses are identified and then typically classified by the primary care site before patients are routed to cancer navigators and tertiary staff."
